title: Soldier's Heart
description: Isaiah Wright is broken. So broken he's positive he'll never be fixed again. Surviving every soldier's worst nightmare is enough for him to want nothing more than to give into the blackness that plagues him.Emma Nicholls knows pain. Four years after the devastating loss of her fianc√©, she's set up her own business providing service dogs to veterans in an attempt to put her own life back together.Circumstance brings Isaiah into her life, but neither are prepared for the fire that burns between them. It's immediate, one broken soul finding solace in another, but it's also... terrifying.His soldier's heart is surrounded by walls ten feet high. But maybe, just maybe, Emma and her brood of trainee service dogs can break through and be the light he so desperately needs.Librarian's note: See alternate cover edition of ASIN B01C6FV0V4 here.
author: Megan  Green
